summary:
Maurice has worked at Witteveen + Bos and made ​​his contribution to large integrated projects as a civil engineering designer since 2007 until 2011. In his last years as a designer, he has followed evening classes Structural engineering Concrete BV. From 2011 he worked as a structural engineer in the Construction Engineering group within the PMC Infra structures. His work as an engineer and experience as a designer result in a broad field of knowledge. He now also has a broad experience with the recalculation of various types of concrete structures in contemporary design load and heavy transports.

As a designer and engineer, he is of great value in projects where flat touch management is of great importance. Interfacemanagement and Systems Engineering are regular part of his responsibilities.

projects.title: N355 Zuidhorn
projects.description:
The detour of the N355 nearby Zuidhorn is a regional road with a total length of 2,65km. The project includes a tunnel, a bridge and a tunnel for cattle.

The tunnel crosses the town Noordhorn and has to guarenty a good environment for the citizens. It's a traditional reinforced concrete tunnel with a total length of 300m (100m closed).

The bridge crosses the Van Starkenborghkanaal. The canal is 54m wide and needs a clearance of 9,1m. Bridge crosses the canal at an 62degree angle therefore the largest span is 68m (world record). The bridge deck wil be build by combining 7 prefabricated pretensioned beams. One beam weighs 235tons. Due to geotechnical conditions each pier had to be designed with thereown unique foundation.

The tunnel for cattle is a small prefabricated tunnel. The tunnel will be build from several elements combined to one solid construction using post-tensioning.

contributors.headline: teamleader, senior geotechnical engineer, project manager at Witteveen+Bos
Team leader Hydraulic Engineering at Witteveen+Bos
Projectmanager / Geotechnical engineer bij Wiertsema & Partners B.V.

projects.title: Aanpak Ring Groningen Zuid
projects.description:
Design construct project for upgrading 12km highway in urban area including 42 civil structures. This project is located in the urban area of Groningen, which means that limiting negative effects on the environment is crucial. Therefore landscaping, noisereduction, Ecology, Waterways en waterdefenses.

2020: Worked as lead engineer for technical design of several temperary bridges, integral bridges, movabel bridge and two tunnels crossing eachother.
2018: As discipline leader Integration I was responsible for the design of 60 wildlife passages, all landscaping including approximately 850trees, 9km vegetated (sound) screens up to 10m high, shipping facilities and quay replacements.
2017: All design aspects relating to the safeguarding of flood risk management belonged to the activities.

projects.title: Tender ViA15
projects.description: Supporting contractor combination GelreGroen in making a winning offer for the DBFM project ViA15. Drafting design (incl. interfaces, opportunities, risks, SE, BIM) and contribution to MEAT, costs and implementation plans. I was responsibel for the technical design of 30 structures (new and existing bridges en underpassings) in the A15 and A12.

projects.title: A9 Gaasperdammerweg
projects.description:
The A9 motorway is being upgraded to five lanes and twice a switch lane.  The quality of life in the area is increased by approximately a 3 km long tunnel. On top of the roof of the tunnel is a large park that connects the neighbourhoods in Amsterdam South East with one another.

I've contributed to the total civil design of the tunnelconstruction, starting from validating the program of requirments till site engineering.

projects.title: Blankenburgverbinding
projects.description: The Blankenbrugverbinding (or "Blankenbrug-connection") will be a new cross-river link in the Rotterdam region, which will connect the A15 and the A20 motorways between Vlaardingen-West and Rozenburg-East and make the Rotterdam region and port more accessible. New junctions will be made at A15 and A20, and the Nieuwe Waterweg ("New Waterway") will be crossed with a submerged tunnel.

contributors.headline: projectmanager Rijnbrug Rhenen namens combinatie Tauw, Witteveen+Bos en Sytax bij Witteveen+Bos

projects.title: Recalculation civil constructions Tilburg (NL) for oversized load
projects.description: Recalculation of eleven civil constructions on oversized loads and load according NEN8700/8701, Eurocode and RBK. Several overpasses / bridges with all different constructive solutions ranging from traditional reïnforced concrete to post-tensioned concrete box girder. The recalculations are based on archival information and additional research. For this study, I have also prepared an an advisory report with respect to the removal and testing of rebar and concrete cores to gather data for determing matarialproperties

projects.title: Oosterweelverbinding rechteroever
projects.description: Second opinion and optimized design of a double-level-cut-and-cover tunnel through the port of Antwerp. The access roads of the tunnel are designed using the watertight natural soillayer with excavations up to 25m. Inside these large excevations are several large civil structures. For the project with a total length of 7 km we have delivered a concept design, cost estimating and SE. Within this project I functioned as a structural engineer and designer.

contributors.headline: Specialist Geotechniek at Van Hattum en Blankevoort
teamleader, senior geotechnical engineer, project manager at Witteveen+Bos

projects.title: Centrale As
projects.description: The Centrale As is 2x2 regional road to improve the infrastructure in Friesland (north of Holland). The desing of this project was ment as an input for developing civil contracts. The road is 60km long and includes 25 civil constructions. There are several dive-unders for road en railway traffic, viaducts and an aqueduct.

projects.title: N261 Tilburg-Waalwijk
projects.description:
Winning tenderdesign for the reconstruction N261 including traffic junction with A59. The project includes ten new structures (viaducts, underpasses and a wildlife crossing) and eight existing structures (viaducts and underpasses).

http://www.viadrupsteen.nl/n261/

projects.title: A4 Delft-Schiedam
projects.description: Winning tenderdesign for the A4 which consists of 2.6 km half-sunken road, 1 km sunken road, 1.9 km landtunnel and civil structures for the benefit of crossing infrastructure (three viaducts, an eco-aqueduct and a tram passage). The A4 connects to the A20 through traffic junction Kethelplein consisting of twenty civil engineering structures (bridges / flyovers).

projects.title: Movable bridge Ventspils, Latvia
projects.description:
It's a very unique bridge because the double bascule bridge was build in 1960 and had never been working. In 2007 Witteveen+Bos was contracted to renovate the bridge. 

This mend:
- adding 2 trafficlanes
- reïnforcing the piers and abutments
- improving the bascule parts (cellar, sleves and mechanics)
- new steel-concrete brigdedeck (span 33-33-30m) 
- Sagpipe for conducting cables and piping

projects.title: Westrandweg
projects.description:
The Westrandweg is an extention of the highway A5 forming a link with the Coentunnel with a total length of 10km. In total there are 10 civiel constructoins in this project. The most important construction is the 3,5km long fly-over. It exists out of 84 piers, with one cappingbeam for each pier to support the meanly prefabricated deck.

This project also include the largest span in Holland build from prefabricated pretentioned concrete beams. With a length of 61,5m is spans over the Haarlemmer ringvaart at an angel of 40 degrees.

profile_positions.description:
The calculation and design of concrete structures primarily civilian.

Recalculate existing structures due to safety checks, upgrading, and / or heavy transports.
profile_positions.title: Civil Structural Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Designer of mainly large (integral) civil projects.
 
Task is to design structures such as viaducts, bridges, tunneling, etc. eqoducts
 
Additional tasks:
  - Draw / design coordinator
  - System Engineering
  - Interfaces (All but the structure itself - eg roads, flora & fauna, water, noise, cables and pipes)
